GpioLeakDetector.description: Configuration for GPIO based Leak Detector.

Name.description: The name of the leak detector.

SubType.description: The type of leak detector from https://redfish.dmtf.org/schemas/v1/LeakDetector.v1_2_0.json.

PinName.description: The GPIO pin name for the leak detector.

Polarity.description: The GPIO polarity depicting its active status.

Group.description: The leak detector group to which the leak detector may belong.

Level.description: The severity level of the leak detector.

DefaultAction.description: The action to take if the leak detector becomes enabled.
